title: Paying yearly rent for bank for Lockers - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: she says that what's the ruling on keeping my jewels and jewelry in a safe deposit box in a in a bank this is totally permissible there's nothing wrong in that because it's a service that the bank is providing there is no riba there is no interest involved so it's like um transferring money from One bank account to another country this is normal and this is halal and there's no problem in that insh all
